name: @nestjs-bff/universal
description: A backend and frontend module for nestjs-bff
author: ahrnee <ahrndee@gmail.com>

scripts.build: npm run clean:dist && npm run build-only
scripts.build-and-link: npm run build && cd dist && npm link
scripts.build-only: npm run copy:package && npm install && tsc
scripts.clean:dist: cd dist && ls | grep -v node_modules | xargs rm -rf && cd ..
scripts.pub: npm run build && cd dist && npm publish --access public
